pr_title: KOGITO-2365 - Extract kogito time package to a new module to be reused on job-service

timeline.bodyText: please add a name to the module something like:   <name>Kogito :: Timer</name>

replies.bodyText: I'll apply the formatting, I basically moved the class but since this is an old class, the formatting is different from the one we are currently using, this could happen with other classes I moved on this refactoring as well...
replies.author: tiagodolphine

timeline.message: KOGITO-2365 Extract kogito time package to a new module to be reused on job-service
Moving calendar on the new timer module
Using generics in TimerService and Job
Inserting kogito timer description on pom, fix formatting
